The world shifts and rolls around you, shadows and images fading in and out, unseen and unnoticed. While you cannot quite percieve the details of the land before you, you can begin to feel its scope.
This rolling, shifting land is your dreamscape, where you live when you sleep, and where you die when you wake. Here you are are lord and ruler, you are god made flesh, and this world is yours to command.
How would you command it?

You summon the command into your mind and allow it to take form. You visualize it around you, becoming reality. Once you feel ready to make it happen, you stretch your hands out and attempt to mold the world.
